thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Brian Kay
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Brian Kay

author: Brian Kay
title: Brian Kay
text: We have visited New Zealand twenty times and every time we have hired a car from Omega. From the moment we email giving our requirements, we have always known that we are in extremely good hands and are guaranteed the best and friendliest possible service. This has always made the trips so easy to manage and the cars have always been totally reliable. We wouldn't ever think of going elsewhere. In short, thoroughly recommended!
